position: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test
name: Atom Bank
description: Atom, a leading fintech disrupting the traditional banking model, is seeking a Senior Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) who will be responsible for creating, implementing, and maintaining automated functional & non-functional tests using the latest tools, advising on best testing practices and working collaboratively across team boundaries. Candidates should have proven experience in an SDET Test Automation role, hands-on experience with various automation tools, and excellent technical, communication, and problem-solving skills. The offered salary is £65k-£70k, with a 4-day work week, flexible and remote working options, and several perks such as a generous pension scheme, professional development fund, and enhanced parental leave.
